name: Cryptic (itch) (SierraEsco)
description:
The forest north of your sleepy hometown has long been feared and respected by those who know it. It’s dense and mysterious, and many spread rumors of violent and strange inhabitants lying in wait for the ignorant wanderer. When you find that you must travel through it, you’re given a choice: treat the woods with the deference you’ve always been taught, or suffer the consequences.

(full screen recommended)
